import React from 'react'; const MainContent = () => { return (

Welcome to the Book Exchange Platform

Exchange, donate, or lend books easily within your community.

Browse Books

Find books available for exchange or donation.

List a Book

Share the books you no longer need with others.

Your Profile

Manage your listings and exchange requests.

Popular Categories

Fiction Non-Fiction Academic Biography
); }; export default MainContent;
